mapper.select: SELECT H.M_NAME,G.* FROM (SELECT F.CI_STATUS_YN,F.M_NO,E.* FROM (SELECT D.CNT,C.* FROM JOB_VACANCY C JOIN(SELECT A.JV_NO,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM JOB_VACANCY A JOIN REPORT_VACANCY B ON A.JV_NO = B.JV_NO GROUP BY A.JV_NO)D ON C.JV_NO = D.JV_NO)E JOIN COMPANY_INFO F ON E.CI_NO =F.CI_NO )G JOIN MEMBER H ON G.M_NO = H.M_NO WHERE CI_STATUS_YN ='N' AND CNT>=10
